name: CrimeSight (itch)
description:
Something's wrong.

You can tell.

Your job is to make sense of the mysterious, but that's not always easy. You've got a few tricks up your sleeve, though.

Inspired by Jim Butcher's The Dresden Files, you play as a detective investigating supernatural incidents. Use your journal and your wits - plus a stroke of magic - to explore crime scenes, collect clues, and deduce the mythical culprit before they cause more harm. But be careful; these criminals know how to cover their tracks...

This project was created by a team including myself and 4 others, and it contains a single scenario of the proposed game. Credits for work and assets can be found within the project.
